11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC2_VAD_WITH_LEVEL_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC2_VAD_WITH_LEVEL_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15
16#include "modules/audio_processing/agc2/cpu_features.h"
17#include "modules/audio_processing/include/audio_frame_view.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21// Class to analyze voice activity and audio levels.
22class VadLevelAnalyzer {
23 public:
24 struct Result {
25 float speech_probability; // Range: [0, 1].
26 float rms_dbfs; // Root mean square power (dBFS).
27 float peak_dbfs; // Peak power (dBFS).
28 };
29
30 // Voice Activity Detector (VAD) interface.
31 class VoiceActivityDetector {
32 public:
33 virtual ~VoiceActivityDetector() = default;
34 // Resets the internal state.
35 virtual void Reset() = 0;
36 // Analyzes an audio frame and returns the speech probability.
37 virtual float ComputeProbability(AudioFrameView<const float> frame) = 0;
38 };
39
40 // Ctor. `vad_reset_period_ms` indicates the period in milliseconds to call
41 // `VadLevelAnalyzer::Reset()`; it must be equal to or greater than the
42 // duration of two frames. Uses `cpu_features` to instantiate the default VAD.
43 VadLevelAnalyzer(int vad_reset_period_ms,
44 const AvailableCpuFeatures& cpu_features);
45 // Ctor. Uses a custom `vad`.
46 VadLevelAnalyzer(int vad_reset_period_ms,
47 std::unique_ptr<VoiceActivityDetector> vad);
48
49 VadLevelAnalyzer(const VadLevelAnalyzer&) = delete;
50 VadLevelAnalyzer& operator=(const VadLevelAnalyzer&) = delete;
51 ~VadLevelAnalyzer();
52
53 // Computes the speech probability and the level for `frame`.
54 Result AnalyzeFrame(AudioFrameView<const float> frame);
55
56 private:
57 std::unique_ptr<VoiceActivityDetector> vad_;
58 const int vad_reset_period_frames_;
59 int time_to_vad_reset_;
60};
61
62} // namespace webrtc
63
64#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC2_VAD_WITH_LEVEL_H_
65
